{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASRock |model=H2R |revision=HDMI Dongle |asin=B01717UTXC |newegg=N82E16833967012 |price=55 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model= |availability=now |fcc_date=10/13/2015 |fcc_id=2AFEB-H2R |ic_id=20403-H2R |pcb_id=1246-01000151-50Z |type=access point, miracast receiver, media player, media streamer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=Micro USB |cpu1_brand=Actions Microelectronics |cpu1_model=AM8251 |cpu1_cspeed=600 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192EU |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Micrel |eth_chip2_model=KSZ8081;KSZ8081MNX; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=HDMI, Miracast, AirPlay |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ASRock |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|ASRock H2R - 2-in-1 Travel Router/HDMI Dongle}} :''HDMI Miracast Adapter, Streaming Media Player'' :[http://www.asrock.com/Networking/H2R/ Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.asrock.com/Networking/G10/support.html Support page]
"1246-01000151-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2782095 FCC photos]. {{see also|ASRock G10|ASRock X10R|Edimax}}
===Features=== *Detachable 2-in-1 dongle - travel access point (AP) :or an HDMI dongle with 2T2R 802.11n Wi-Fi (Miracast) * HDMI Miracast/EZplay & DLNA (1920x1080 output resolution) :Works with devices: Android/iOS smartphones and tablets
===Specifications=== *N300 Wi-Fi travel access point *Memory: 128MB Flash + 128MB RAM *One 10/100 Mbps Ethernet port *Two internal antennas *Supports Miracast/EZplay & DLNA :1920 x 1080 output resolution *Micro USB port for power adapters
===News=== *[http://www.asrock.com/news/index.asp?id=2801 ''ASRock G10 Press release'' on '''ASRock'''] *[http://www.tomshardware.com/news/asrock-router-mu-mimo-g10-networking,29287.html ''ASRock G10'' on '''TomsHardware'''] *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/asrock-g10-router.27478/ ''ASRock G10'' on '''SNB''' forums]
===Reviews=== *[http://article.techlabs.by/51_35719.html ''ASRock G10 Router'' on '''TechLabs'''] :'''[[ASRock H2R HDMI Dongle]]''' (MFG OEM: [[Edimax]]) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2AFEB-H2R 2AFEB-H2R] (2015-10-13) ''HDMI 2-in-1 Router'' :*SoC: [[Actions Microelectronics]] AM8251 @600MHz MIPS :*Flash: 128MB ''Winbond'', RAM: 128MB ''Nanya'' :*WLAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8192EU (2T2R 802.11bgn USB 2.0) :*LAN: [[Micrel]] ''(Mindray)'' KSZ8081MNX FE (10/100 PHY)
